thread.section_title: Things Engraved Inc. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Things Engraved Inc. | thingsengraved.ca
thread.title: Jill
thread.title_full: Things Engraved Inc. reviewed by Jill

author: Jill
title: Jill
text: I have never received such great customer service as I did recently fro Things Engraved! I had ordered a wedding photo album on line and when I received it the front panel was falling apart. I was discouraged as the wedding was too soon to order another and have it delivered. I thought I will have to try and glue it back together myself. I sent an email to their customer service to air my disappointment and much to my surprise I received a reply immediately. Within minutes they had arranged for a store located nearby to replace it and so I went in and got one. Wonderful customer service!
